verbs.description: hasbro [V: will] lay off hundreds after toys ‘ r’ us closure hasbro will lay off up to 10 of its employees victims of the fallout after toys r us closed its doors the toymaker has not yet disclosed how many of its 5 400 global employees will lose their jobs just over half of hasbro staff works in the united states closure united states china hasbro
